mapper.insert: insert into schedule_alarm(alarm_index,schedule_no,collabo_no) values((select max(alarm_index) as alarm_index from alarm where user_id=#{user_id}),#{schedule_no},#{collabo_no})
mapper.select: select sa.schedule_no,sa.alarm_index from alarm a join schedule_alarm sa on sa.ALARM_INDEX = a.ALARM_INDEX where user_id=#{user_id}
